data.convo: Taylor , you're looking a little pale . Are you sure you want to hand out nametags ? Do I have a choice ? You said the guy who was supposed to do it didn't show . True . Keep up the good work . Hello , welcome to the reunion of the Class of ' 93 . Just come over here , sir . First you need to sign in and get your photo nametag . And don't forget to put in an order for your reunion memory book . Would you like to donate to our alumni fund ?
